title: Summoners Society is looking for more support staff to keep growing!
body:
Hello Summoners, 

SumSoc is growing and fast! We are looking for new members to join our awesome team, so we are able to keep supporting the community! 

We are looking for people for these current roles:

-Online tournament runners (Need be available at least one weekend a month)
https://goo.gl/forms/nIOpMfFZCKlVcb5C3

-Social Media Staff: (Need to be able to have access to internet regularly )
https://goo.gl/forms/XUdkxBwocSuK1jLS2

Volunteers for live events Sydney: (Must be able to get in the city for events)
https://goo.gl/forms/dyuKDAhc9KYWvX992

We will be in contact if you're successful.

Thank you,

Summoners Society
